data.name: Anjanath Power
data.primaryBonusDesc: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

data.name: Anjanath Will
data.primaryBonusDesc: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Increases Stamina Cap.

data.name: Astral Blessing
data.primaryBonusDesc: Often increases the number of rewards received at the end of a quest. (Does not work if joining a quest in progress)

data.name: Bazelgeuse Protection
data.primaryBonusDesc: Once only, above a certain threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you

data.name: Commission Guidance
data.primaryBonusDesc: Lets you carve one additional time (no effect when joining mid-quest)

data.name: Diablos Mastery
data.primaryBonusDesc: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boost ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

data.primaryBonusDesc: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boost ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

data.secondaryBonusDesc: Increase Max Bow Charge level by one.

data.secondaryBonusDesc: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

data.secondaryBonusDesc: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

data.primaryBonusDesc: Increases Elemental Damage when landing critical hits.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

data.primaryBonusDesc: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

data.primaryBonusDesc: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

data.secondaryBonusDesc: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. Wanes each melee hit or shot fired.

data.name: Vaal Soulvein
data.primaryBonusDesc: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

data.name: Nergigante Ambition
data.primaryBonusDesc: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

data.name: Kirin Divinity
data.primaryBonusDesc: High chance of increased quest rewards.

data.name: Namielle Divinity
data.primaryBonusDesc: Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv2 and increases elemental damage.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv3 and increases elemental damage.

data.name: Shara Ishvalda Divinity
data.primaryBonusDesc: While wearing a mantle, gain Windproof Lv3, Earplugs Lv3, Tremor Res Lv3, and Flinch Free.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: While wearing a mantle, gain Tremor Resistance Lv3, Earplugs Lv5, max Windproof, and Flinch Free.

data.name: Rajang's Rage
data.primaryBonusDesc: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time(60 seconds) after sharpening.

data.name: Survivor
data.primaryBonusDesc: Prevents zombie and effluvial buildup.

data.name: Safi'jiva Seal
data.primaryBonusDesc: Elem. Abnormal status, & affinity up with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking but can be recovered by continually attacking.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Enhances attacks even more with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.

data.name: Silver Rathalos Essence
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Greatly increases Elemental Damage when landing critical hits.

data.name: Gold Rathian Essence
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Greatly increases status effect damage when landing critical hits.

data.primaryBonusDesc: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

data.name: Frostfang Absolute Art
data.primaryBonusDesc: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

data.name: Alatreon Divinity
data.primaryBonusDesc: Increases true element attack by 5% (2% for bowguns) of combined elemental resistances.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Increases all elemental resistances +20%.

data.name: Fatalis Legend
data.primaryBonusDesc: Removes the skill cap for all skill secrets.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: Grants True Razor Sharp/Spare Shot. Health/Stamina +100 at the start of a quest or after fainting. (Effect doesn't stack).

data.name: Power Cell
data.primaryBonusDesc: Increases defense and eliminates damage reactions. Taking several hits knocks it out, but reactivate over time.

data.name: New World
data.primaryBonusDesc: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
data.secondaryBonusDesc: High chance of increased quest rewards.
